data.description:
**"Lightning Archer"** takes you to Elyria, a planet on the edge of collapse due to war and destruction. As the chief archer, defend your cities in **24** mission levels and 3 arenas against **31** unique enemies, from warriors to mages.  Wield your enchanted bow and fight to save Elyria!!
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39001714_496528782996036_2512591358710666504_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=iCMGtmC13h8Q7kNvgGslfcy&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AO8-rw7aDLW0V4H3aryTFi0&oh=00_AYBf4QNxMYIswbXdO1nYwUrrB-30p9OSh02S_Q_d0f5hyg&oe=66D9A1D3)
# Game Highlights:
# 360° Immersive Tower Defense Game.
Immerse yourself in a revolutionary tower defense game that amplifies direct combat with monsters from every angle. Engage in thrilling 360-degree battles, offering a more dynamic and realistic combat experience.
#  Diverse and Challenging Monsters and Bosses
Face off against **31** unique monsters, including warriors, mages, and flying creatures, each with distinct attack styles and defenses. Every encounter presents a new challenge, making every shot count and keeping gameplay exciting.
# Rich Level Content
Explore **24** mission levels and **3** arenas across diverse environments like forests, deserts, and islands. Discover hidden gameplay elements that offer endless replayability and keep you coming back for more.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75622023_407707758477321_3040847374970127121_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=06pxooVhg8gQ7kNvgE3QZLm&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AO8-rw7aDLW0V4H3aryTFi0&oh=00_AYAHqbO5vAri_F6wARWbeialfA3rp2oD-0ogdVWBbY-wdw&oe=66D99E70)
# Stunning Magical Skills
Unleash **5** powerful Magic skills and **11** Rune skills. Beyond regular attacks, summon divine beasts with rune skills to aid you in taking down formidable Bosses.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974471_865256211694960_1846404686320230728_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=4bTwI4jo24UQ7kNvgGGWccP&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AO8-rw7aDLW0V4H3aryTFi0&oh=00_AYAa2FsXXNIw2fjHBnPzVNdfEsCgfPK2LdfdodY1ltS7bQ&oe=66D97C80)
# Earn Your Battle Honor
Unlock **18** medals and **6** secret easter egg medals, and compete for glory on the global leaderboard. Prove your skills and claim your place among the elite.

changelog.change_log: Now we add French, Japanese and Spanish support.

Version 2.1
1. Added 12 new monsters with unique gameplay mechanics.
2. Added 16 new mission levels, offering more fun and challenges.
3. Each battle mode now records the highest score, with leaderboards ranked by the total of the highest scores from three arenas.
4. Other usability and stability improvements.

Release Notes V2.0
	1. New Level Mode: Introduced level mode with shorter durations and more diverse gameplay options.
	2. Monster Attacks: Monsters can now attack players, requiring timely shield defense.
	3. New Magic Arrow: Introduced the tracking arrow, which can lock onto and follow monsters.
	4. New Monsters: Added two new types of monsters – archers and flying dragons.
	5. Elite Monsters: High-level monsters now have health points and can be defeated with headshots.
	6. Enhanced Visuals: Improved incentive effects and better interface display.
	7. Usability and Stability: Various other usability and stability improvements.

“V1.2.0
1. Added two new types of monster: Bomb Bird and Bomberman.
2. Electric towers can attack any monsters except for Bosses, with activation count changed from time-based to attack count-based.
3. Players can immediately respawn in the same place if they fail to defeat a Boss.
V1.1.0
1. Added a new training ground for beginners to help new users master the use of skills.
2. Appropriately adjusted the difficulty levels of the stages.”

Version 1.1 Change Log:
1. Added a new training ground for beginners to help new users master the use of skills.
2. Appropriately adjusted the difficulty levels of the stages.
